# Customize‚ú® StorefrontCollectionsin Seconds.
Create smart editorial grids to boost product discovery by >25%.
[**Try for Free** Try for Free](https://depict.ai/<https:/apps.shopify.com/depict/?ref=depict.ai>)[Chat with usChat with us](https://depict.ai/</contact>)

Loved by Fashion Brands
![KOTN](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/66436c1a44b2f7e9ff0cf666_1.%20Kotn-white.png)![CLDP](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664b2e62c5fb571cb3b0cf06_10.%20Aplace-White.png)![Shutterheim](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643a944b5d747413b65b230_2.%20Stutterheim-white.png)![CHIMI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643a99889fd841ec61e2425_3.%20CHIMI-white.png)![Sandqvist](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643a9d489fd841ec61e7e39_sand.png)![HOPE](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643aa6276a78349d93919c6_9.%20Hope-white.png)
![ginatricot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/66436c29bf85c0edc19a502d_6.%20Gina%20Tricot-White.png)![EYTYS](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/66436c3a1f0a05ff1f3582cb_8.%20EYTYS%20Logo-white.png)![Shutterheim](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643a944b5d747413b65b230_2.%20Stutterheim-white.png)![CHIMI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643a99889fd841ec61e2425_3.%20CHIMI-white.png)![Sandqvist](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643a9d489fd841ec61e7e39_sand.png)![HOPE](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6643aa6276a78349d93919c6_9.%20Hope-white.png)
80% of store traffic interacts with collections. Make it convert.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f9343d82e36635307f2f4_hand-pointer-regular%201.svg)
## Stale Storefront Grids
Your collections pages are monotonous because they're too costly to customize.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f93fc12ae325e821e35c1_store-solid%201.svg)
## Non-Visual Curation
Your merchandising tools are complex, unintuitive and limited.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664c52250567c9e0034b7510_Group%2092.svg)
## Un-used Assets
You spend $$$ on creating brand assets that your shoppers never get to see.
## Next-level Merchandising
Depict lets you curate your collection pages like the world's best ecomm teams.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f93ad75df2f1049fd11c5_grip-solid%201.svg)
### Add Content Cards in Product Grids
#### Create collections that are scrollstoppers.
Add videos and images to show off your brand assets and link them across your site.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f9343d82e36635307f2f4_hand-pointer-regular%201.svg)
#### Instant Drag-and-Drop
#### The smoothest drag-and-drop for merchandising yet.
Instantly preview your merchandising on mobile and desktop layouts.With stock and performance data at your fingertips.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f93fc12ae325e821e35c1_store-solid%201.svg)
### Highlight Your Best Products
#### Some products deserve a closer look.
Duplicate product cards in the grid and choose the default and on-hover images per collection.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f934c46e1af167e8e5145_file-lines-regular.svg)
### Combine Manual & Automated Sorting
#### Sorting your collections has never been faster.
Set Sorting Rules based on tags, collections, and dynamic groups.See the changes sync instantly to your storefront.
![Collection list view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/67125b78fc11fd3a2411041f_app_for_fashion_merchandising.avif)
![Item preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/671909e77a1ca0a5763ce94b_CleanShot%202024-10-23%20at%2016.07.36%402x.avif)
![Collection view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6711244c4d2f43aa88fe3bbf_DnD_done_right.avif)
![Dashboard view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/671909e77bd93893527840e8_CleanShot%202024-10-23%20at%2016.17.30%402x.avif)![Dashboard view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/67190c2e6ab3dc08d1e734e7_Frame%20343606.avif)
## The App for Fashion Merchandising
Depict lets you manage your collection pages like the world's best ecommerce teams.
![Collection list](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/67125b78fc11fd3a2411041f_app_for_fashion_merchandising.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f93ad75df2f1049fd11c5_grip-solid%201.svg)
### Add Content Cards Inside Product Grids
Make your shopper experience stand out.Add videos and images to show off your brand assets and link them across your site.
![Collection view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/671909e77a1ca0a5763ce94b_CleanShot%202024-10-23%20at%2016.07.36%402x.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f9343d82e36635307f2f4_hand-pointer-regular%201.svg)
### Drag-and-drop Done Right
Experience the smoothest drag-and-drop for merchandising yet.‍With stock and sales data at your fingertips.
![Dashboard view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/6711244c4d2f43aa88fe3bbf_DnD_done_right.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f93fc12ae325e821e35c1_store-solid%201.svg)
### Highlight Your Best Products
Some products deserve a closer look.Duplicate product cards in the grid and choose the default and on-hover images per collection.
![Item preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/671909e77bd93893527840e8_CleanShot%202024-10-23%20at%2016.17.30%402x.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/664f934c46e1af167e8e5145_file-lines-regular.svg)
### Combine Manual & Automated Sorting
Set Sorting Rules based on tags, collections and stock & sales data.See your changes sync instantly to your storefront.
![Item preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/67190c2e6ab3dc08d1e734e7_Frame%20343606.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6630ceeee6fd1a867237f62e/663341236c196a5c428356c5_quotation.png)
"A game-changer compared to standard Shopify collections, we‚Äôre operating at lighting speeds across 6 stores.

generated_description:
**Depict: Revolutionizing Fashion E-commerce Merchandising**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from Stockholm, Sweden, Depict is quickly making waves in the fashion e-commerce space. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S20, it brings a fresh perspective on how brands can present their collections online. With a dynamic team of 32, led under the guidance of Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, Depict is on a mission to enhance merchandising for fashion-focused online retailers.

Their platform stands out by enabling e-commerce brands to create visually engaging collection pages that encourage customer interaction. Depict simplifies the process of curating storefronts, allowing retailers to enhance product discovery by over 25%. This is not just a theoretical promise; brands that adopt Depict see significant improvements in how shoppers engage with their offerings.

The company is tagged as a player in the fields of personalization, e-commerce, and fashion ‚Äì three areas where they excel by not only improving aesthetics but also backing up their solutions with robust data. Depict allows users to:

1. **Create Smart Editorial Grids**: These grids render collections in a way that captivates visitors and encourages them to explore further.
2. **Drag-and-Drop Functionality**: Merchandising becomes a breeze with an intuitive interface that makes layout changes seamless and instant.
3. **Visual Content Integration**: Brands can add videos and images to their product grids, transforming static display into rich storytelling that resonates with customers.
4. **Automated and Manual Sorting Options**: Retailers can set sorting rules based on tags or dynamically adjust which products get highlighted based on stock and sales data.

With endorsements from various fashion brands, including KOTN and CLDP, Depict is proving to be a game-changer. Retailers using the app have reported up to 40% time savings in their merchandising efforts, along with enhanced efficiency in workflow processes.

Their approach is particularly relevant in today's market, where the storefront competition is fierce, and standing out is critical. By focusing on the user experience, Depict ensures that even small e-commerce players can compete with larger brands.

If you‚Äôre looking to supercharge your fashion e-commerce business, consider exploring what Depict has to offer. Their platform is not just about selling products; it's about creating a shopping experience that captivates and converts.

For more information, visit their website at [Depict AI](https://depict.ai/).
